title: One More Chance
description: After disaster strikes between Haley and Liam, her life is tattered. She's back at school and hating life, while Liam is moving on with his. Chemistry, history, and desire surface when they are unexpectedly reunited. While pushing past her feelings, she tries to move on, discovering something she never imagined. How can things go from great to horrible at the snap of a finger? When Haley is given the opportunity of a lifetime, she takes it. Liam wants nothing more than to be supportive; the only issue is...how do you move on when you're still in love with someone? When tragedy strikes everything is put into perspective, decisions are made and lives are changed. Will Liam and Haley be able to move on and be happy or do they need to give it one more chance?
author: T. Renee Fike
